hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name, ctr_lov_order FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND cod_field_tag = 'TXT_696' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY txt_lov_value
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name, ctr_lov_order FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND cod_field_tag = 'TXT_696' AND txt_lov_value = :id
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_771' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY to_number(txt_lov_value)
SELECT city_code, city_name FROM ba_city_master WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND UPPER(city_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY city_code
SELECT city_code, city_name FROM ba_city_master WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND city_code = :id
SELECT b.city_code, b.city_name FROM ektpcoremapping a, ba_city_master b WHERE a.value_ncbs = b.city_name(+) AND a.field_name = '2' AND a.value_dukcapil = :id
SELECT CAST(cod_state AS VARCHAR2(3)), nam_state FROM ba_state_codes WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND UPPER(nam_state) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY nam_state
SELECT CAST(cod_state AS VARCHAR2(3)), nam_state FROM ba_state_codes WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND TRIM(:id) = TRIM(CAST(cod_state AS VARCHAR2(3)))
SELECT b.cod_state, b.nam_state FROM ektpcoremapping a, ba_state_codes b WHERE a.value_ncbs = b.nam_state(+) AND a.field_name = '3' AND a.value_dukcapil = :id
SELECT cod_acct_officer, nam_acct_officer FROM ba_acct_officer_mast WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND UPPER(cod_acct_officer) LIKE (UPPER(:like)) ORDER BY nam_acct_officer
SELECT cod_acct_officer, nam_acct_officer FROM ba_acct_officer_mast WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND CAST(cod_acct_officer AS VARCHAR2(3)) = :id

SELECT cod_business_cat, txt_business, cod_high_risk, desc_highrisk FROM ci_business_types WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND cod_entity_vpd = 11 AND UPPER(txt_business) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY txt_business
SELECT cod_business_cat, txt_business, cod_high_risk, desc_highrisk FROM ci_business_types WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND cod_entity_vpd = 11 AND cod_business_cat = :id
SELECT country_code, description, desc_high_risk FROM ba_ifst_country WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND UPPER(description) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY country_code
SELECT country_code, description, cod_high_risk, desc_high_risk FROM ba_ifst_country WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND UPPER(description) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY country_code
SELECT country_code, description, desc_high_risk FROM ba_ifst_country WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND country_code = :id
SELECT country_code, description, desc_high_risk FROM ba_ifst_country WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND UPPER(description) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY country_code
SELECT country_code, description, desc_high_risk FROM ba_ifst_country WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND country_code = :id
SELECT txt_profess_cat, txt_profession, desc_highrisk FROM ci_prof_codes WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND UPPER(txt_profession) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(txt_profess_cat)
SELECT txt_profess_cat, txt_profession, cod_highrisk, desc_highrisk FROM ci_prof_codes WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND UPPER(txt_profession) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY txt_profession
SELECT txt_profess_cat, txt_profession, desc_highrisk FROM ci_prof_codes WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND txt_profess_cat = :id
SELECT b.txt_profess_cat, b.txt_profession FROM ektpcoremapping a, ci_prof_codes b WHERE a.value_ncbs = b.txt_profession(+) AND a.field_name = '5' AND a.value_dukcapil = :id
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_BDSM_001' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY ctr_lov_order
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_BDSM_001' AND txt_lov_value = :id

SELECT TO_NUMBER(txt_lov_value), CASE WHEN INSTR(txt_lov_name, 'KURANG DR') > 0 THEN REPLACE(txt_lov_name, 'KURANG DR', '<') WHEN INSTR(txt_lov_name, 'LEBIH DR') > 0 THEN CASE WHEN INSTR(txt_lov_name, '-', 8) = 0 THEN REPLACE(txt_lov_name, 'LEBIH DR', '>') ELSE REPLACE(txt_lov_name, 'LEBIH DR', '') END ELSE txt_lov_name END AS txt_lov_name FROM ( SELECT txt_lov_value, REPLACE(SUBSTR(txt_lov_name, 5), 'P -', 'P.') AS txt_lov_name FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND cod_field_tag = 'TXT_759' ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(txt_lov_value)

SELECT TO_NUMBER(txt_lov_value), CASE WHEN INSTR(txt_lov_name, 'KURANG DR') > 0 THEN REPLACE(txt_lov_name, 'KURANG DR', '<') WHEN INSTR(txt_lov_name, 'LEBIH DR') > 0 THEN CASE WHEN INSTR(txt_lov_name, '-', 8) = 0 THEN REPLACE(txt_lov_name, 'LEBIH DR', '>') ELSE REPLACE(txt_lov_name, 'LEBIH DR', '') END ELSE txt_lov_name END AS txt_lov_name FROM ( SELECT txt_lov_value, REPLACE(SUBSTR(txt_lov_name, 5), 'P -', 'P.') AS txt_lov_name FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND cod_field_tag = 'TXT_759' ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND txt_lov_value = :id
hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT compositeId.codCcy, namCcyShort, namCcyShort FROM BaCcyCode WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' ORDER BY compositeId.codCcy
SELECT compositeId.codCcy, namCcyShort, namCcyShort FROM BaCcyCode WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND compositeId.codCcy = :id
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT CAST(a.txt_cust_prefix AS VARCHAR2(150)), a.txt_cust_prefix FROM CI_PREFIXES a, ektpcoremapping b WHERE a.txt_cust_prefix = b.value_dukcapil AND a.flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND a.cod_entity_vpd = 11 AND UPPER(b.value_ncbs) LIKE (UPPER(:like)) ORDER BY a.txt_cust_prefix

SELECT cod_business_cat, txt_business FROM ci_business_types WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND cod_entity_vpd = 11 AND UPPER(txt_business) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(cod_business_cat)
SELECT ITEM_INDEX, DISPLAY_TEXT FROM mow_scrn_dropdown_mast WHERE ctl_name = 'cmbEthnic' AND UPPER(DISPLAY_TEXT) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY ITEM_INDEX

SELECT ITEM_INDEX, DISPLAY_TEXT FROM mow_scrn_dropdown_mast WHERE ctl_name = 'ctlEducation' AND UPPER(DISPLAY_TEXT) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY ITEM_INDEX
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_748' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY to_number(txt_lov_value)

SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_882' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY to_number(txt_lov_value)
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_687' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY to_number(txt_lov_value)
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag='TXT_885' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY to_number(txt_lov_value)
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'SDF_STMNT_INDICATOR' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY txt_lov_value
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_757' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY to_number(txt_lov_value)
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_880' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY to_number(txt_lov_value)
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'SDF_ECHANNEL_TXN' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY txt_lov_value
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_917' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY txt_lov_value
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_878' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY to_number(txt_lov_value)
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_879' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY to_number(txt_lov_value)
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_877' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY to_number(txt_lov_value)
SELECT lob.cod_lob, lob.nam_lob FROM ba_lob_mast lob, ba_lob_brn_xref brn WHERE lob.cod_lob = brn.cod_lob AND brn.cod_cc_brn LIKE (UPPER(:like)) ORDER BY lob.cod_lob
SELECT cod_cc_brn, nam_branch FROM ba_cc_brn_mast WHERE flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND cod_entity_vpd = 11 AND cod_cc_brn <> 411 AND UPPER(cod_cc_brn) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY cod_cc_brn

SELECT distinct prod.cod_prod, prod.nam_product FROM ch_prod_mast prod, ba_prod_brn_xref brn WHERE prod.cod_prod = brn.cod_prod and prod.flg_rd = 'N' and prod.cod_typ_prod = 'L' and prod.dat_prod_expiry > sysdate AND brn.cod_cc_brn = :cdbranch AND UPPER(prod.cod_prod) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') AND prod.cod_prod not in (select regexp_substr((Select strval from parameter where cdparam='TAX.Amnesty.Product'), '[0-9]+|[a-z]+|[A-Z]+', 1, lvl) from (select (Select strval from parameter where cdparam='TAX.Amnesty.Product'), level lvl from dual connect by level <= length((Select strval from parameter where cdparam='TAX.Amnesty.Product')) - length(replace((Select strval from parameter where cdparam='TAX.Amnesty.Product'), ',')) + 1)) ORDER BY cod_prod

SELECT distinct prod.cod_prod, prod.nam_product FROM ch_prod_mast prod, ba_prod_brn_xref brn WHERE prod.cod_prod = brn.cod_prod and prod.flg_rd = 'N' and prod.cod_typ_prod = 'L' AND brn.cod_cc_brn LIKE (UPPER(:like)) ORDER BY cod_prod

SELECT cod_ccy, nam_ccy_short, nam_currency, nam_ccy_country from ba_ccy_code ccy where ccy.cod_entity_vpd = 11 and ccy.flg_mnt_status = 'A' AND CCY.nam_ccy_short LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') order by ccy.cod_ccy
select IDBRN, NAMBRANCH, TYPEBRANCH, IDBRANCHPARENT from COMBRNMAST where IDBRN like ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') order by IDBRN

SELECT Order_no, Field_name FROM FIELDPARAMETER WHERE ID_FIELD = 20 AND MODULE_NAME = 'Cash Operation Management' AND FLG_TMP = 'A' AND ID_TEMPLATE = 1 AND UPPER(Field_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%')
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_BDSM_002' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY ctr_lov_order
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_BDSM_002' AND txt_lov_value = :id

SELECT cod_bi, UPPER(nam_bank) FROM ( SELECT cod_bi, TRIM(nam_bank) || ' (' || cod_bi || ')' AS nam_bank FROM ( SELECT cod_bi, cod_bank, nam_bank, total, max_length, DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY cod_bi ORDER BY total DESC) rank_, DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY cod_bi ORDER BY LENGTH(nam_bank) DESC) rank2_ FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cod_bi, cod_bank, NAM_BANK, COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY cod_bi, cod_bank) AS TOTAL, MAX(LENGTH(nam_bank)) OVER(PARTITION BY cod_bi, cod_bank) AS max_length FROM pm_fin_inst_dir_mast WHERE (cod_bi, cod_bank) IN ( SELECT DISTINCT cod_bi, cod_bank FROM pm_fin_inst_dir_mast WHERE cod_bi IS NOT NULL AND cod_bank <> 1 ) ORDER BY cod_bi, cod_bank, total DESC, max_length DESC, LENGTH(nam_bank) DESC ) ORDER BY cod_bi ) WHERE rank_ = 1 AND rank2_ = 1 ORDER BY cod_bi ) WHERE nam_bank LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY nam_bank

SELECT cod_bi, UPPER(nam_bank) FROM ( SELECT cod_bi, TRIM(nam_bank) || ' (' || cod_bi || ')' AS nam_bank FROM ( SELECT cod_bi, cod_bank, nam_bank, total, max_length, DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY cod_bi ORDER BY total DESC) rank_, DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY cod_bi ORDER BY LENGTH(nam_bank) DESC) rank2_ FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT cod_bi, cod_bank, NAM_BANK, COUNT(*) OVER(PARTITION BY cod_bi, cod_bank) AS TOTAL, MAX(LENGTH(nam_bank)) OVER(PARTITION BY cod_bi, cod_bank) AS max_length FROM pm_fin_inst_dir_mast WHERE (cod_bi, cod_bank) IN ( SELECT DISTINCT cod_bi, cod_bank FROM pm_fin_inst_dir_mast WHERE cod_bi IS NOT NULL AND cod_bank <> 1 ) ORDER BY cod_bi, cod_bank, total DESC, max_length DESC, LENGTH(nam_bank) DESC ) ORDER BY cod_bi ) WHERE rank_ = 1 AND rank2_ = 1 ORDER BY cod_bi ) WHERE cod_bi = :id
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_LLD_001' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY ctr_lov_order
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_LLD_001' AND txt_lov_value = :id
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_LLD_001_' || :like ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(txt_lov_value)
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_LLD_001_' || SUBSTR(:id, 1, INSTR(:id, '|') - 1) AND txt_lov_value = SUBSTR(:id, INSTR(:id, '|') + 1)
select k.value, k.description from rr_cust_service_values_bdi k where k.field_type = 'DistrictCode' AND UPPER(k.description) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY to_number(k.value)
select k.value, k.description from rr_cust_service_values_bdi k where k.field_type = 'BranchCode' AND UPPER(k.description) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY to_number(k.value)
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_825' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY to_number(txt_lov_value)
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM udf_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_826' AND UPPER(txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY to_number(txt_lov_value)
select CCY_COD, CCY_NAME || '(' || CCY_COD || ')' AS CCY_NAME from mcr_ccy_mast where UPPER(CCY_COD || CCY_NAME ) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%')
select nam_ccy_short, nam_currency from ba_ccy_code where UPPER(nam_ccy_short || nam_currency ) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%')
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_SKHT_HAJI_TYPE' AND UPPER(txt_lov_value || txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY ctr_lov_order
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_SKHT_HAJI_TYPE' AND txt_lov_value = :id ORDER BY ctr_lov_order
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_SKHT_GENDER' AND UPPER(txt_lov_value || txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY ctr_lov_order
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_SKHT_GENDER' AND txt_lov_value = :id ORDER BY ctr_lov_order
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_SKHT_MARTL_STAT' AND UPPER(txt_lov_value || txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY ctr_lov_order
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_SKHT_MARTL_STAT' AND txt_lov_value = :id ORDER BY ctr_lov_order
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_SKHT_EDUCATION' AND UPPER(txt_lov_value || txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY ctr_lov_order
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_SKHT_EDUCATION' AND txt_lov_value = :id ORDER BY ctr_lov_order
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_SKHT_OCCUPATION' AND UPPER(txt_lov_value || txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY ctr_lov_order
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_SKHT_OCCUPATION' AND txt_lov_value = :id ORDER BY ctr_lov_order
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_SKHT_STATE' AND UPPER(txt_lov_value || txt_lov_name) LIKE ('%' || UPPER(:like) || '%') ORDER BY ctr_lov_order
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_SKHT_STATE' AND txt_lov_value = :id ORDER BY ctr_lov_order
SELECT txt_lov_value, txt_lov_name FROM bdsm_lov_mast WHERE cod_field_tag = 'TXT_SKHT_STT_' || :like || '_CITY' ORDER BY ctr_lov_order
